name: Verify Update Environment API when environment is not found (Negative Case) -- @1.1

steps.name: Given FireBase_User sends PUT request to update environment details with an invalid env_id "ab809075-108f-4f67-2fb5-dc909ed60692"
Then FireBase_the status code should be 404 for not found error
And FireBase_the response should contain an error message "Not Found"
And FireBase_the message should be "Environment with ID "env_id" not found for update."

fullName: Update Environment API: Verify Update Environment API when environment is not found (Negative Case)
